title._content: Religious service for German troops in Polish town  (LOC)

description._content: Bain News Service,, publisher. Religious service for German troops in Polish town [between 1914 and ca. 1915] 1 negative : glass ; 5 x 7 in. or smaller. Notes: Title from data provided by the Bain News Service on the negative. Photograph shows German soldiers at a religious service in Poland, during World War I. (Source: Flickr Commons project, 2012) Forms part of: George Grantham Bain Collection (Library of Congress). Subjects: World War, 1914-1918. Polish town Format: Glass negatives. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print General information about the Bain Collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.ggbain Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ggbain.18310 Call Number: LC-B2- 3367-15
